https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uyxMcy1LuAGG28frkOoqNGiY5vd.jpg The Teatro del Mondo is one the most famous works by the italian architect Aldo Rossi. This surprising floating theatre sailed, in 1979, from Venice to Dubrovnik becoming a legendary event in history of architecture. The man and the architect trough the words of some of his best friends and fans. Aldo Rossi: Il Teatro del Mondo
